description.example: This campaign belongs to John's Donuts and will be used for marketing.
description.title: Description

status.description: The current status of the campaign.

campaignId.description: The ID of the campaign created via bulk creation. This campaign will only have a campaignId after the campaign has been created.
campaignId.title: Campaignid

created_at.description: The date and time that the campaign was created.
created_at.title: Created At

error.description: Errors related to a campaign creation failure.
error.example: More sample messages required for some mobile network operators.
error.title: Error
